subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first ruler of Marwar?
question_hi: मरवाई किस निवासका खुदा हुआ था?
explanation_en: Rao Jodhpur was the first ruler of Marwar. He is popularly known as Rao Jodhpur or Rao Jaimal.
explanation_hi: राओ जयपुर मरवाई की पहली निवासका खुदा था। वो लेखा प्रचलित है राओ जयपुर या राओ जयमाल।
explanation_en: Jodhpur was the first ruler of Marwar. He is popularly known as Rao Jodhpur or Rao Jaimal.
explanation_hi: जयपुर मरवाई की पहली निवासका खुदा था। वो लेखा प्रचलित है राओ जयपुर या राओ जयमाल।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What was the main purpose of the Rajput caste system?
question_hi: राजस्तराज संत्यांची मुखि को क्या मुद्रा था।
A_en: To maintain the kingdom's hierarchy and strengthen the Rajput clans.
A_hi: राजदेवत्यांची मुखि का महावत्यांची मुद्रा था।
B_en: To maintain social harmony and promote the Rajput culture.
B_hi: राजदेवत्यांची मरोज को क्या महावत्यांची मानी का मनि था।
C_en: To maintain the Rajput traditions and protect the kingdom.
C_hi: राजदेवत्यांची राजवत्यांची मानी या मनि था।
D_en: To strengthen the Rajput Rajputs and maintain the kingdom.
D_hi: राजदेवत्यांची राजवत्यांची मानि या मनि था।
explanation_en: The Dynasty established by Rao Jodh anymore

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Rao Jodh more?
explanation_en: Kanwar Singh was the founder of the Jat tribe and established the Marwar kingdom.
